choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews
Day 1: Breakfast - Overnight oats with chia seeds and fruit. Lunch - Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables and quinoa. Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and avocado salsa, served with a side of steamed broccoli.
Day 2: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl made with almond milk, frozen fruit, and chia seeds. Lunch - Turkey lettuce wraps with cucumber, tomato, and hummus. Dinner - Grilled tofu with roasted vegetables and brown rice.
Day 3: Breakfast - Greek yogurt parfait made with almond milk, granola, and fruit. Lunch - Chickpea salad with mixed greens and vinaigrette dressing. Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and salsa verde, served with a side of steamed asparagus.
Day 4: Breakfast - Omelette made with eggs, spinach, and tomatoes. Lunch - Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables and quinoa. Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with cashew butter and sliced banana, served with a side of steamed green beans.
Day 5: Breakfast - Smoothie made with almond milk, frozen fruit, and honey. Lunch - Turkey lettuce wraps with cucumber, tomato, and hummus. Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables and brown rice.
Day 6: Breakfast - Greek yogurt parfait made with almond milk, granola, and fruit. Lunch - Chickpea salad with mixed greens and vinaigrette dressing. Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with pistachios and salsa verde, served with a side of steamed asparagus.
Day 7: Breakfast - Overnight oats with chia seeds and fruit. Lunch - Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables and quinoa. Dinner - Baked sweet potato topped with almond butter and sliced banana, served with a side of steamed green beans.
